group_1.textCenter: What happened to the stuff we left here?

group_1.textRight: I took it to the warehouse yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, the warehouse behind the Community@Center?

group_1.textRight: No, the warehouse of the Neighborhood@Association.

group_1.textLeft: You took it to the one far away?
That's the gear we were gonna use for the soup@kitchen this time.
Even if you did put it away, you still gotta keep it@somewhere close by, you know?

group_1.textRight: Ah... Apologies, I misunderstood you...
Sorry for the trouble, Miyu, but could you come@with me to retrieve it?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but, but!
If we go to the warehouse and back, won't it@take quite a while...?

group_1.textRight: It's going to be difficult for us to play with Princess@and the others today, indeed...
Still, we're the ones who brought this on ourselves.
We can't simply leave now.

group_1.textLeft: Urgh... We must apologize to Her Highness, right...
Oh, a message from Miyurin!
Instructor and Miyurin can't come today...

group_1.textRight: Maybe they've received more work to do for the@Youth Association?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, if we can't use the Community Center@as our meeting place,
where do we meet up with Shigurin and Hagurin?
Hm? What is it, Hiko-kun?
Mhm... Mmm...
Yeah, like, it's safer if we continue to meet up in@Takarazaki City, right?

group_1.textRight: Then let's wait somewhere else,
and let the two of them know through our group@chat, shall we?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yuppers!
Oh, speak of the devil—@It's Shigurin!
...[wait:1.2][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Ah...

group_1.textRight: Oh, my... Looks like they have to help with the@Drama Club again, and can't come here today...

group_1.textLeft: Guess there's no hangin' with everybody today@either, huh...

group_1.textRight: Shigure-chan and Hagumu-chan seem to be@having a hard time, too...

group_1.textLeft: ...Dunno if that's legit.

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe they never actually wanted to play from@the moment I invited them,
and they're all just avoiding cute lil' me right now...

group_1.textRight: It's just a coincidence.
There's no reason for all of them to be avoiding@you, Hime-chan.

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:1.2][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]I know, right...
(...Somehow, something just came to mind.)
(That time when everyone looked at me funny...)

group_1.textRight: Hime-chan...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Sorries, it's nothing.@That wasn't super like this cutie, yeah?

group_1.textRight: You were looking forward to it so much.
I know it's simply not convenient for them all,
but it's natural that anyone would find it a bummer@that it had to be canceled.

group_1.textLeft: Thankies!★
I'd be like, since we've already waited sooo much@let's postpone again![chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1][chara:102801:motion_0] But like...
How 'bout we have fun, just the two of us, like@we promised at the start?
We can watch loads of romance dramas at Sasha's@place and DIE of cuteness!★

group_1.textRight: That's a good idea too, I guess.
I'm going to have to say goodbye to my current@home soon, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Well... Actually, I forgot to tell you yesterday, but...
I'm moving out.

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:1.2][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]What?
